content.rendered:
We are Specialized in & Services we Provide:

 

Ree & Partners; We work with the principles only, with strict rules & regulation and standard international business procedures. As a senior partner. (Subject to the Contract/Agreement, MOU/NDA, Affidavit & Oath International business principles & procedures, with individual’s responsibilities) We will arrange to provide International Projects Funding. Anywhere in the World. Through Banking & Financial Credit Instruments. BG/SBLC/L/C’s; Companies & Subsidiaries Stocks, Shares, Business Loan, Secured Loan. Vendor Financing Project, Finance, Bank overdraft, Mortgage, Re-mortgage Personnel Guarantee, Bank Guarantee, Trust, Foundations, Worldwide Banks, Investors, Lenders, Sub-lenders/Commercial Banks, Investment Banks, Offshore Banks/Building Society/Joint Ventures, Sponsored Groups, Investment & Wealth Assets Management Group, Overseas Funds, Government Grants, Letter of Credit Standby Letter of Credit/ Collaterals, Collaterals Providers/Lending Institutions Treasury Bonds, Securities and Local and International Banking Instruments, Subject to the L/Cs, SBLC, BG MTNs/DD/MT103/MT202 to complete the Projects. (Fully & Completely Subject to the Banking Financial Contract/Agreement) Banking & Financial Instruments; Purchase or Lease/Issue-Monetize-Trading Platform. (SBLC/BG/L/Cs/ MTN/DD) AAA-AA-Plus Top Five Banks worldwide (HSBC Barclays UBS Standard Chartered/Deutsche Bank) and all other (250) Banks Worldwide and Banks & Financial Institutions or Worldwide Private Investors; Asian Development Bank. Islamic Development Bank. World Bank. International Monetary Fund. International Finance Corporation. European Investment Bank. International Finance Agency of Bahrain. Inter-American Development Bank. European Bank for Reconstruction & Development. Development Bank of Latin America. Investment & Wealth Assets Management Group. Investment Partners Network & Capital Trust Associates. Arab, British & American Financial Group. Worldwide White Collar Associates. General Public. (Worldwide Private Investors). Funding Community Development Financial Institutions & Credit Unions. ANA Trust Fund & Arab Fund. Eurasian Development Bank. European Union. National Development Trust Fund. Investments Partners Network & Capital Trust Associates. Other Commercial Banks. Plus, Implementations of Idea’s & Innovations. And Sovereign Guarantees from Governments. And (Entirely Subject to the Fees & Charges and Entirely Subject to the Local Collaterals, or Collaterals Providers Group, and RWA (Risk-weighted asset). Permissions, Approvals and Documentations from the Provincials & Federal Government and Completely Subject to the Commission for Necessary Immediate Appointments Internal and External Arrangement & Management Cost. All the Compulsory Fee & Charges with Fully Subject to the Banking Compliance Statutory & Regulatory Requirements. And All Other Necessary Permissions & Approvals from Governments. And the Concern Authorities & Financial Institutions Authorities or any other Regulated Authorities worldwide or Governments. For necessary appointments and processing fee, collateral providers engagement fee, B/G/SBLC/L/Cs providers engaged fee, monetiser engaged fee, documents preparation fee, and other spot expenses, token promise fee, insurance commitment fee, chartered surveyor Engaged fee, investment arrangement & agreement fee, financial management cost, settlement fee, audit firm engaged fee, solicitors engaged fee, financial advisory firm engage fee, intermediary and brokers engaged fee & charges, VAT & other Tax fee & charges, consultancy fee & charges engagement fee. Or Any Other Compulsory and Necessary Consultancy Fee & Charges, Internal and External Arrangement & Management Cost). And Sovereign Guarantees for the Governments Projects Only.

Large-Scale Infrastructures & Projects. Details as under:

 

  • (50 to 2000) Megawatts Electricity Power/Energy Plant Station:
  • (Mega Housing Projects) Engineering & Construction Industry:
  • Petroleum Refinery:
  • Gold Refinery:
  • Energy Industry:
  • Pharmaceutical Industry:
  • Water & Agriculture/Natural Resources Industry:
  • Petrochemical Industry:
  • Manufacturing Industry & Timber Industry:
  • Healthcare & Hospital Industry:(Social Protection)
  • Banking & Financial Industry (Banking & Stock Exchange/Money Exchange License).
  • (IT) Computer Industry & Software/HardwareIndustry:
  • Investment & Wealth Asset Management Company:
  • Information & Communication Technology Industry:
  • Cement Industry & Trade:
  • Hotel & Leisure Industry:
  • Shipping & Fishing Industry:
  • University & Education Industry:
  • Motor Way & Express Highway:
  • Airport & Sea Port, Railway & Bus/Transport Industry:
  • Full Range of Business, Banking & Financial Advisory & Services.
  • Investment & Wealth Asset Management Consultancy Services.
  • (BG) Bank Guarantee (SBLC) Standby Letter of Credit (L/C’s) Letter of Credit. (Issue/Monetize/Lease/Purchase & Trading Platform)
  • Complete Import & Export Consultancy Services.
  • Mergers and Acquisition: Security & Business Transfer:
  • Family Office & Private Trust Company: Custody and Trustee Services:
  • Offshore Corporate Services & administration: Managed Trust Companies: Offshore Executive Remuneration, Offshore Payroll Services:
  • Cash Flow Improvement, Factoring and Invoice Discounting Services:
  • Trade Finance and Shares & Stock Finance:
  • Retailer and Merchant Finance Solutions:
  • Commercial and Residential Mortgage & Re-mortgage. Buy to Let Mortgages:
  • International Mortgages and Property Finance:
  • Commodities Trading:
  • Buying and Selling Properties/Real Estate: (Worldwide)
  • Business, Banking & Financial deals:
  • Franchise Businesses:
  • Joint Venture Worldwide:
  • L/C’s Discounting:
  • Trade Finance Providers: Equity Release & Re-Structure:
  • Investment & Wealth Asset Management. Administration Services:
  • Business Start-up Services & Business Licenses, Worldwide:
  • Company Formation & Company Secretarial Services Worldwide:
  • Provide solutions for all the company requirements: Strategies, Planning and Organizing:
  • Private Equity & Venture Capital, Fund administration Services:
  • Capital Gains & Inheritance Tax Planning for Tax Saving & Exemption:
  • Welfare Foundation & Capital Trust: (INGO) International Non-Government Organizing.
  • Annual Accounts & Balance Sheet: Book-Keeping: Income & Expenses, Profit & Loss Accounts:
  • Companies House, Accounts Annual Returns:
  • Budgets & Cash flow Forecast/Business Forecast/Financial Forecast & Planning:
  • Taxations & Personal Tax Submission of Corporation Tax:
  • Directors Personal Tax Return; Self Assessment & Self Employment:
  • Tax Planning to Cut Your Taxes:
  • Religious & Charity Finance:
  • Professional Business Plan & Projects Feasibility:
  • Dealing with Proposals Rejections by Banks & Investors:
  • All Phase of Investment & Wealth Assets Management, Business, Banking, Accounting & Finance. Fund Structuring,
  • Legal Support Service. 

As part of our complete registrar services, we will…

 

  • Stocks & Sharers Registrar services:
  • Stock & Shares, Scrutiny, Floatation and Balloting: Acting as an IPO receiving agent: Evaluate and produce reports on proxy cards:
  • Maintain and update share registers:
  • Manage the registration and certification of share transfers:
  • Respond to shareholder enquiries:
  • Prepare and dispatch of share certificates:
  • Prepare, print and dispatch dividend or interest payments:
  • Reconcile dividend bank accounts:
  • Attend shareholder general meetings and administering polls:
  • Prepare shareholder listings for lodging at Companies House/Corporate Law Authority:
  • Provide a Depository Interest Receipt (DIR) facility:
  • Banking & Financial Compliance Services.
